seo.title: Free QR Code Generator with Logo & Custom Design | Professional QR Codes Online
seo.description: Create professional QR codes with custom logos, colors, and designs. Free online QR code generator for business cards, menus, events, and marketing campaigns. Download high-quality PNG, SVG formats instantly.
seo.keywords: QR code generator, custom QR codes, QR code with logo, free QR generator, business QR codes, marketing QR codes, contactless menu QR, event QR codes, professional QR design
seo.og_title: Professional QR Code Generator with Custom Logo & Design

bmc.text_2: If this tool has saved you time and helped your business, consider buying me a coffee! Your support helps keep this tool free and continuously improved.

features.text_2: Everything you need to create professional QR codes for your business, events, and marketing campaigns.

features.text_6: Choose from unlimited color combinations and design options to match your brand identity perfectly.
features.text_8: Download QR codes in multiple formats (PNG, SVG, PDF) with scalable vector quality.
features.text_10: Your data stays secure. We don't store your QR code content or personal information.

use_cases.text_2: From restaurants to events, our QR codes adapt to your specific needs and industry requirements.

fun_facts.text_2: The world has embraced QR codes like never before. Here's why they're essential for modern business.

historical_context.text_3: QR codes were invented by Denso Wave for tracking automotive parts in Toyota factories.
historical_context.text_5: COVID-19 accelerated QR code adoption for contactless interactions worldwide.
historical_context.text_8: QR codes are now essential for business, marketing, and digital experiences globally.
